name: Pio's Journey
description:
Pio's Journey is a short, atmospheric puzzle

platformer game with physics-based grappling

hook mechanic. Developed by one person for

Indie Game Ignite competition at COMPFEST 13.

Trailer

Screenshots Controls

A / D  —  Move

W  —  Jump

Space / Left Mouse Click  —  Grapple

Space / Right Mouse Click  —  Release

W / S  —  Adjust rope length

a Game by

M. Yusuf H
